questions.text: What did Julia George do for a living?
questions.explanation:
News Producer.

	He was a news producer on a show similar to "The Larry King Show". The show within the show was called "Louise Herrick Live". She was dating a prominent federal judge. The opening scene of the show had the two of them in her office. Julia George was played by Piper Perabo.

questions.text: Oscar Keaton was wanted in connection with a hit and run during the pilot. Who played his defense attorney?
questions.explanation:
Daniel Sunjata.

	The attorney, Jake Gregorian, was scheduled to be on Julia's show that night. While the rest of the newsroom thought they ambushed the attorney, it turned out that George and Gregorian were working together to manipulate the news. Oscar Keaton, played by Kevin Zegers, was a billionaire who founded a social media network. Among the option, only Daniel Sunjata was a real actor. The others are characters from various other shows.

questions.text: What was hidden in the floorboard of Oscar's car?
questions.explanation:
Cocaine.

	Oscar told Jake that he had been clean for five years. Then in his next breath he told his attorney that he had cocaine in a hidden compartment on the floorboard. He claimed he held an intervention for a friend and that it just hadn't been disposed of yet.

questions.text: How did Ryan Mills get hired as Julia's new production assistant?
options: He was a source for a story, then stayed on to work.
He snuck into the room and just started working
He won a contest for the job.
questions.explanation:
His dad ran the network.

	Ryan had been "exploring" Europe for most of 20s, but according to his dad he was back and ready to work. He started out getting coffee, but wanted to work his way up the ladder. He started by trying to find news stories.

questions.text: Julia's boyfriend, the recently confirmed federal judge, had a history of hiring call girls.
questions.explanation:
True.

	One of Julia's producers, a former call girl, recognized him from her former life. She confirmed to Julia that the boyfriend was still an active client of her former employer. He went by the name of Henry Wolf when hiring escorts.

questions.text: What did the Los Angeles City Councilman do that was newsworthy?
questions.correct: Wore a Rebel flag shirt to a party
options: Voted to close a mental hospital
questions.explanation:
Wore a Rebel flag shirt to a party.

	The party was 12 years before the photo surfaced. A local wine bar owner had the photo and was demanding $100,000 to keep the photo quiet. The councilman claimed it was a costume party and he was dressed as Bo Duke from "The Dukes of Hazzard."

questions.text: Who was driving Oscar's car the night of the car accident?
questions.explanation:
Sarah.

	Sarah Keaton, Oscar's wife was driving the car. The neighbor's security camera caught who the driver was. Sarah was also a former lover of Jake Gregorian, the family lawyer.

questions.text: Sarah Keaton was killed in her home.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Oscar returned to the house against Jake's warnings. Soon after he called Jake to come to the house. When Jake got there he saw Oscar crouched over Sarah's body with three gunshot wounds in her stomach. The next morning the police were expected to issue an arrest warrant for her.

questions.text: How were Jake and Bradley Gregorian related?
questions.explanation:
Brothers.

	The two Gregorian brothers were partners in their law firm. Bradley Gregorian was played by J. August Richards.

questions.text: What did Sarah order the night she was in the car accident?
questions.explanation:
A fake passport.

	Sarah Keaton, who ended up dead. Jake Gregorian and his associate figured out where she had gone and found out the fake passport she had paid to have made.
